title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Small-Group Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Environment enabling asynchronous/synchronous collaboration using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can solve over 80% of complex mathematical problems using small-group collaboration tools.
Learners improve peers' problem-solving processes three or more times by applying feedback routines.
Learners execute role allocation and communication strategies with over 90% effectiveness during online collaborative processes.

resources: Collaborative platform (e.g., Google Workspace, Zoom Breakout Rooms)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
